name: Build Wars
description: Use and boost your creativity in these non-violent battles of block-building magic. Show that you are the best and gain recognition from fellow builders in this harsh but ultimately fair player vs. player online building game. Win, unlock new blocks and with it your potential.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2.5 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
